original_title: 西村京太郎トラベルミステリー　伊豆誘拐行　高速道路５時間06分の盲点…　赤い車から消えた女！
overview: Katsura Aya (Shiratori Yasuyo), a young and popular actress, is kidnapped. Igarashi (Honda Hirotaro), the president of the production company, calls Totsukawa (Mihashi Tatsuya) and Kamei (Aikawa Kinya) of the police. Totsukawa and Kamei learn that the kidnapper's name is Aoi Hebi (Blue Snake) and that Aoi Hebi is asking for one million yen for ransom.
title: The Woman Who Disappeared From Her Red Car
